text.text: From humble origins to critical acclaim.
The Re-2Ox process was launched to coincide with the expansion of Lithium-ion batteries and the resulting need for highly efficient recovery.
The original circuit was repurposed to accomodate different feed types and was validated by SGS Canada.
Upstream and downstream connections enabled initial production of battery grade specification materials.
Further optmiziation continues with plans made for a wider scale operation.
